scripts.build-infrastructure: ng build narik-infrastructure && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-infrastructure
scripts.build-common: ng build narik-common && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-common
scripts.build-core: ng build narik-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-core
scripts.build-ui-core: ng build narik-ui-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-core
scripts.build-app-core: ng build narik-app-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-app-core
scripts.build-ui-ng-bootstrap: ng build narik-ui-ng-bootstrap && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-ng-bootstrap
scripts.build-ui-ngx-bootstrap: ng build narik-ui-ngx-bootstrap && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-ngx-bootstrap
scripts.build-ui-material: ng build narik-ui-material && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-material && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-material/src/styles/* dist/narik-ui-material/styles
scripts.build-ui-devextreme: ng build narik-ui-devextreme && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-devextreme && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-devextreme/src/styles/* dist/narik-ui-devextreme/styles
scripts.build-ui-primeng: ng build narik-ui-primeng && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-ui-primeng
scripts.build-cli: ng build narik-cli && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-cli
scripts.build-jwt: ng build narik-jwt-authentication && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-jwt-authentication
scripts.build-signalr: ng build narik-signalr-client && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-signalr-client
scripts.build-client-storage: ng build narik-client-storage && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik-client-storage
scripts.build-lib: npm run build-infrastructure && npm run build-common && npm run build-core  && npm run build-ui-core &&    npm run build-app-core && npm run build-ui-material && npm run build-ui-ng-bootstrap && npm run build-ui-ngx-bootstrap && npm run build-ui-devextreme && npm run build-ui-primeng && npm run build-jwt && npm run build-client-storage && npm run build-signalr &&  npm run build-cli
